name: python ldap user environment
short_description: This is a scripting environment based on shellscripts and python modules that gives one the ability to manage users, groups and aliases in an ldap directory. It also provides configuration examples of how to use ldap for authenticating users with Linux.

topic.fullpath: Topic :: System :: Systems Administration :: Authentication/Directory :: LDAP
